text: 1: Creeping Shadows
trans: 偷偷靠近之影

text: Vaseraga undergoes treatment from a healer which induces bad memories of all the people he's lost in the past. Meanwhile aboard the Grandcypher, the crew notice more and more insect-like things in the sky as they get closer to the island where Zeta and the others are waiting.

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Guh!
Vaseraga's body is decaying.
trans: 腐烂的身躯。

text: A putrid stench comes off his dissolving black limbs, induced by the power of the primal beast before him.
trans: 在眼前星晶兽的力量下，巴萨拉卡的四肢从末端逐渐黑化，散发出恶心的臭味，并一点点地崩溃。

name: Young Skyfarer/年轻的骑空士
text: Protect Captain Vaseraga! Get him somewhere safe on the double!
trans: 保护巴萨拉卡团长！快带他去安全的地方！

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Stop! Leave me... Run!

name: Young Skyfarer/年轻的骑空士
text: As long as you're alive, we can rebuild. We promised, didn't we? Our lives are yours!
trans: 只要有你，团就能重建......我不是说过了吗......我们的性命就交给你了！

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: No! Stop this right now!

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Cough...
Vaseraga's lungs have fallen to the black decay that now spreads throughout his entire body. The pain is so intense that twitching a single finger tip proves impossible.
trans: 咳嗽的时候，我的肺破裂了。现在黑血染遍全身，疼得连一根手指头都动不了。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Agh... Aaah!
His comrades who are carrying him are not immune to the pain either, and one by one they drop.
trans: 拖着自己身体的同伴们也无法忍受腐烂的痛苦，一个接一个地倒下。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: (My conceit caused this mess...)
trans: 是我的傲慢导致了那件事......

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: (Countless sacrifices made so that I could survive. This body was forged so that no one would have to fall into the same pits.)
trans: 做出了无数牺牲后，我存活了下来。为了不让任何人重蹈覆辙......因此，才造就了我的这副身躯......

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
trans: 但是......

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: (If only I had jumped in front of that boy...)
trans: 我，竟没能为那个孩子做一面坚盾...

name: Healer/魔医师
text: You're awake. The procedure is over. How do you feel?
trans: 你醒了。...这样手术就结束了。感觉如何？

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Never better. Thanks for your time.
trans: 没问题。可真是给你添麻烦了啊。

name: Healer/魔医师
text: With that said, you still require a different treatment.
trans: 但是，你还需要一些特殊的手术。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: A lot has... happened.
trans: ...因为种种原因。

name: Healer/魔医师
text: Well, it's not my place to pry. Now as for the results of your body analysis...
trans: 好吧，我不会打听的。那么，还有一件事。你身体的分析结果显示...

name: Healer/魔医师
text: You've gained physical strength that defies logic, though you wouldn't know it at a glance.
trans: 不明原理的肌肉强化正在进行。光看表面根本不知道这究竟是怎么回事...

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: No surprises there.
trans: 我就知道。

name: Healer/魔医师
text: Something's taken root throughout your body. It bends to your will, which I'm sure will safeguard you in times of battle.
trans: 有样东西在你身体里扎根。它会按照你的意愿行动，我猜大概是在帮助战斗吧。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: I remember my armor changing form in a previous battle.
trans: 以前，在战斗中，我的盔甲曾发生过形状变化。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Do you think this "root" you mentioned has anything to do with making armor come out of my body?
trans: 你说的『根』，能不能外露到我身体表面来做装甲？

name: Healer/魔医师
text: It's difficult to perform a definitive analysis, but since you seem able to control your form at will, it's within the realms of possibility.
trans: 虽然分析得不是很详细，但可以随意改变形状这一点，是很有可能的。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Mm. Thanks again.
trans: 这样啊。谢谢。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: (It always feels unsettling whenever I'm consumed by Grynoth's power.)
trans: 每当我被格罗诺斯的力量吞噬，我都会有一种奇怪的不协调感...

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: (There's something inside me. Something that's awakened...)
trans: 果然在我的身体里，发生了什么...

name: Beatrix/贝阿朵丽丝
text: Hey, there he is!
trans: 啊，他们来了！

text: Vaseraga stops when he hears Beatrix calling him in the distance.
trans: 听到远处贝阿朵丽丝的呼唤，巴萨拉卡停下了脚步。

name: Beatrix/贝阿朵丽丝
text: Don't go off on your own now! You're supposed to be under our watch!
trans: 不要一个人行动，你是监视对象啊！

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: I have a tracking device on me too. There shouldn't be any problems.
trans: 监视装置的话，我也有戴。应该不会有问题。

text: Vaseraga gives a little shrug, causing the bag in his hand to rustle.
trans: 巴萨拉卡微微耸了耸肩。就在这时，手里的袋子发出了沙沙的响声。

name: Beatrix/贝阿朵丽丝
text: Huh? What's in the bag? Did you buy something?
trans: 嗯？那个手提袋里有什么？你还买了别的什么吗？

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Yes. I found a rare breed of apples.
trans: 是的。我看到了不寻常的苹果。

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: Apples?

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: Oh, as a gift for Vyrn.
trans: 啊，原来如此。这是给碧的礼物啊。

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: Ahaha. You said you didn't want to see them, but here you are looking forward to it.
trans: 啊哈哈。 他说他不想买，但我还是很期待呐。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: It's simply good manners to give a small gift.
trans: 我不知道。纪念品是家常嘛。

name: Zeta/泽塔
text: Whatever. We should make the most of our time with the crew until Ilsa's gotten everything ready.
trans: 嘛，算了。在伊尔莎的准备工作结束之前，和姬塔他们待一会儿就可以了。

name: Vaseraga/巴萨拉卡
text: Mm.

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Ah! We're almost there!
trans: 啊！姬塔，阿碧！我们已经到了！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Red and the others are already on the ground, right?
trans: 红姐妹们已经到那里了吗？

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: It's going to be great seeing everyone again.
trans: 我现在很期待见到大家啊！

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Yep. How many days has it been since we got to see their faces? Hope they've been doing well.
trans: 是的。我们多久没和他们见面了。他们还好吗？

text: Their hearts beat with excitement at the thought of the long-awaited reunion. It's at that point that 姬塔 looks off far into the sky.
trans: 许久未见，这次相聚让人兴奋不已。就在这时，姬塔突然望向了远方的天空。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: What? Do you see something?
trans: 怎么了姬塔？你找到什么了吗？

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: Is it those bugs again? They're flying everywhere.
trans: 啊，远处有虫子...？可以看到它们在飞来飞去。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Seems like they've been multiplying ever since we got here.
trans: 自从来这里，总觉得数量在不断增加。

name: Lyria/露莉亚
text: How mysterious. Looks like some people are trying to catch them, but...
trans: 不知道那是什么东西。好像也有人想抓住它们...

text: The insect-like entities always keep their distance from land and airships as they continue to hover around.
trans: 像虫子一样的东西总是保持距离地在岛上或者船边飞来飞去。

text: No one has an answer as to what they are, for no one has succeeded in capturing one.
trans: 因此，没人能抓住它，也没有人知道它的真实面目。

name: Vyrn/碧
text: Eh, I haven't seen 'em do anything bad, so we can probably ignore 'em.
trans: 不过也没什么好担心的嘛。

text: The flying objects have never left the crew over the past few days. By now the crew has lost their curiosity in them.
trans: 这几天，它们一直出现在姬塔一行的视线里。不知不觉大伙已经对它没有新奇感了。

name: Insect-Like Drone/？？？
text: Chzzk-chzzk-chzzk
trans: 嗞嗞嗞嗞嗞...

text: They have no reason to believe that the "insects" are watching the Grandcypher's every move.
trans: 因此，没人会想到这些昆虫会一直注视着格兰赛法的一举一动。

name: Insect-Like Drone/？？？
text: Atgert dounf.

trans: scene_evt171231_cp1_q4_s10
kevin
